original_text: And it shall come to pass, when I bring a cloud over the earth, that the bow shall be seen in the cloud:
korean_text: 내가 구름으로 땅을 덮을 때에 무지개가 구름 속에 나타나면

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass,
when I bring a cloud over the earth,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 땅 위에 구름을 가져올 때,

sentences.original_text: that the bow shall be seen in the cloud:
